name: @feegow/publicapi
description: Node package to use Feegow's Public API.

scripts.pushw: git add . && git commit -m "Update %npm_package_version%" && git tag %npm_package_version% && git push origin && git push origin %npm_package_version% && start https://github.com/feegow/feegow-public-api-node-package/releases/new?tag=%npm_package_version%
scripts.pushm: git add . && git commit -m "Update $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push origin && git push origin $npm_package_version && open https://github.com/feegow/feegow-public-api-node-package/releases/new?tag=$npm_package_version
scripts.pub-pushw: yarn patch && npm publish && yarn pushw
scripts.pub-pushm: yarn patch && npm publish && yarn pushm

author: Gustavo Contreiras
